text:
Hello,

I am trying to build a custom code with JS, to fetch a property field value (Multiselect checkbox) and deselect a certain value.

Anybody tried this? Would like to know if this is achievable.

More context: I have a property that can have multiple values: Spain, France, Portugal.

If all of them are checked, and we want to remove only one of the values, would this code enable us to remove one of these values instead of clearing the entire property values?
